meta.title: Mom Life Simulator para Nintendo Switch - Sitio Oficial de Nintendo para Argentina
meta.description: Compra Mom Life Simulator y encuentra otros excelentes productos de Nintendo en línea en la tienda oficial My Nintendo Argentina.

compatibility.caption: Compatible – El comportamiento del juego es coherente con Nintendo Switch.

Product:{\"sku\":\"7100111971\"}.name: Mom Life Simulator
Product:{\"sku\":\"7100111971\"}.description({\"html\":true}):
Welcome to the daily life of the most caring — yet incredibly busy — mom! In this game, you take on the role of a mother who tries to manage it all: caring for her family, keeping the house cozy, and still finding a little time for herself.

Each day is filled with countless tasks, but a mom’s life isn’t only about responsibilities — she can also dedicate time to her hobbies to relax and recharge. Everything depends on how well you plan your day and whether you can complete everything on time.

Features:
- Life as a mom: Step into the shoes of a woman who carries the responsibility of her home, her family, and even her pet. Every day brings new challenges and surprises.
- Two children with different needs: Look after your school-aged child, help him get ready for class, and take care of the baby to make sure he’s always happy and comfortable.
- Household chores: Cleaning, laundry, and cooking — familiar but essential tasks that require attention and speed. The faster you complete them, the more time you’ll have for other activities.
- Pet care: Your little dog needs affection, playtime, and care — otherwise, it will become sad and lonely.
- Time for yourself: Even with a packed schedule, mom can make time for her hobby — helping her rest and maintain a balance between family duties and personal life.
- Balance & time management: The main challenge is to stay on top of everything, managing your energy and time so no one in the family feels left behind.

Are you ready to take on the challenge and create the perfect daily balance?
Product:{\"sku\":\"7100111971\"}.disclaimer:
Se requiere una suscripción a Nintendo Switch Online (se vende por separado) para utilizar la función de guardado de datos en la nube.

©RioverseGames
